meanings.definition: The quality or state of being easily fatigued.
meanings.sent1: Her fatigabilities were evident after just a short walk.
meanings.sent2: His fatigabilities made it challenging to keep up with the group.
meanings.sent3: Despite her fatigabilities, she pushed through and finished the race.
meanings.sent4: The weight of responsibility added to his fatigabilities.
meanings.sent5: The doctor explained the impact of her fatigabilities on daily life.

meanings.definition: The ability to be fatigued easily.
meanings.sent1: The child's fatigabilities meant he needed frequent breaks.
meanings.sent2: She was surprised by her own fatigabilities during the hike.
meanings.sent3: His fatigabilities seemed to increase when he was bored.
meanings.sent4: The long hours of work tested his fatigabilities.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's fatigabilities affected his performance in the competition.
